sections.heading: Dollar,
sections.text: cent and mill to be money of account.

sections.heading: Suits
sections.text:
on accounts, notes or bonds expressed in other money of account: Reduction to

dollars or parts of dollars.

sections.heading: Obligations,
sections.text: judgments or executions payable in legal money.

sections.heading: Interest
sections.text: rate when not fixed by express contract for certain types of transactions.

sections.heading: Agreed
sections.text:
interest rates; compounding; charges or fees; maximum annual percentage rate

for certain consumer credit extended to certain members of military or

dependents.

sections.heading: Public
sections.text: securities: Interest rate for securities issued on or before June 30, 2011.

sections.heading: Obligations
sections.text: of United States Postal Service and Federal National Mortgage Association.
